title: Bug 114470 [Smoke] Error message throws when using new Date("3/2/2005") as value in table filter.
description: When using the value new Date("3/2/2005") in a table filter, an error message is thrown.
OB:
There are errors on the report page: There are error(s) in Table: table8

Error0: data.engine.DataConversionError (1 time(s))

Detail: An error occurred in data type conversion. Cannot convert it to Date. Cannot convert it to Date.
EB: After saving and previewing the report, the filter should work without errors.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:

1. Create a new datasource and a dataset containing a datetime column.
2. Insert a table into the report.
3. Create a filter based on the datetime column.
4. In the value1 input of the filter, enter the following: new Date("...") (e.g., new Date("3/2/2005")).
